title: Your scorecards, officially suck ass

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
A B- for that shit? Honestly I would have expected a C at best. Yet I get games where I wreak havoc and get, a B.

Or are players that bad with Vayne that a B for that shit is average? I like to think Riot have their heads to far up their own asses, no one can have that shit as average.

replies.body: its fucking rotating game mode map ffs. dont expect good scores on urf lmao
I'm not expecting a good score, I'm saying I should have had worse.

The score system is always way off in rotating ques. Imigane the scores of the players who got lower than b.

Still you dont get tokens so why does the score even matter in fun game modes

You had near-average CS.

When people bitch about the rating system, just look at their creep score per minute and you can be 90% sure that is why they got whatever rating.

And yes, that is very stupid,

And no, CSing shouldn't be that important,

And no, Riot isn't going to let us see the actual formula, so go ahead and make a pile more of these threads "Why no S?" and "How much do I have to suck to get the D?".

Go play another game but don't kill a single minion, then see what score you'll get. For everyone who doesn't know yet, CS is king, not KDA.
